game.name: Echo Bastion
game.shortDescription: Echo Bastion is a mix of a grimdark turn-based tactics, tower defense and deckbuilding game. Deploy living cards - soldiers, control them on the grid, and hold the line against relentless demonic waves. No RNG. Just survival.
